vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
Ἀριστόβουλος, -ου, ὁ
(< ἄριστος, βουλή, i.e. best-counselling)
Aristobulus, a Christian: Rom.16:10.†
(From Abbott-Smith. LSJ has no entry)
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of the New Testament, only mentioned at Rom.16.10
§ Aristobulus, "best advisor"
Aristobulus, (Proper name), Rom. 16:10*
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
亞利多布 这个陽性專有名詞在原文的意思是 "最好的輔助者"
一位基督徒的名字 (羅 16:10)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
亚利多布 这个阳性专有名词在原文的意思是 "最好的辅助者"
一位基督徒的名字 (罗 16:10)
